mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.content, t1.discount, t1.icon, t1.bg_image, t.score, t.balance, t2.id as seller_id, t2.`name` as seller_name from t_hotel_member_level_detail t inner join t_hotel_member_level t1 on t.level_id = t1.id inner join t_hotel_seller t2 on t1.seller_id = t2.id where t.member_id = #{userId}

SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.content, t1.discount, t1.icon, t1.bg_image, t.score, t.balance, t2.id as seller_id, t2.`name` as seller_name from t_hotel_member_level_detail t inner join t_hotel_member_level t1 on t.level_id = t1.id inner join t_hotel_seller t2 on t1.seller_id = t2.id where t.member_id = #{userId} and t.seller_id = #{sellerId}

SELECT t.id, t.`name`, t.content, t.discount, t.icon, t.bg_image, t1.`name` as seller_name, t1.id as seller_id From t_hotel_member_level t inner JOIN t_hotel_seller t1 on t.seller_id = t1.id where t.seller_id = #{sellerId}
and t.id !=#{levelId}
